thread.title: Nice Hotel
thread.title_full: Nice Hotel - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jackie B
title: Nice Hotel
text: Stayed here for 5 nights, we were on the 16th floor , Go up to the roof garden if the sun comes out, we sat there with a hot drink & a cake, the room was nice, 4 of us slept in the room with 2 double beds, we had a small fridge & microwave & a coffee maker, we could have done with a kettle to make our morning tea , we managed to just boil water with the coffee maker though so was ok,maids tidied daily with clean towels daily aswell, there is a safe if you need it but we never used it, plenty of storage for clothes & also an iron, ironing board & a good hairdryer , staff were very friendly, if you want to book the Woodbury shopping trip they can do it at reception , you pay a $10 deposit & then pay remainder on the coach, also they will lock your luggage away if you have a late flight, if you go out hotel doors. And turn right then right again that will take you to Times Square, hotel is in good location, would stay here again if we returned.
